sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_684e54af4787f510abc2d264336d4343
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.parBoardConvertUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Get the current dashboard and duplicates the current dashboard to the platform analytics board
		 * Currently only single score report widgets are supported for conversion
		 * other widgets in the dashboard are just ignored</description><name>parBoardConvertUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var parBoardConvertUtils = Class.create();
parBoardConvertUtils.prototype = {
	initialize: function () {

	},

	createPABoard: function (currDashboard) {
		/** 
		 * Get the current dashboard as parm
		 * The function duplicates the current dashboard to platform analytics board
		 * Currently only single score report widgets are supported for converstion
		 * other widgets in the dashboard are just ignored
		 */

		var grPAD = new GlideRecord('par_dashboard');
		grPAD.initialize();
		grPAD.name = currDashboard.name;
		var pAboard = grPAD.insert();
		//Add PA experience
		this.createVisibility(pAboard)
		//add ownership
		this.createOwnership(pAboard, currDashboard);
		// create tabs 
		this.createTabs(currDashboard, pAboard);

		return pAboard;

	},

	createVisibility: function (pAboard) {
		// plt dashbaord requires visibilty to be set so it is avaible in workspace
		var grPDV = new GlideRecord('par_dashboard_visibility');
		grPDV.initialize();
		grPDV.setValue('dashboard', pAboard);
		grPDV.setValue('experience', '08c73d60537101100834ddeeff7b1287'); // PA experience hardcoded sysid
		grPDV.insert();
	},

	createOwnership: function (pAboard, currDashboard) {
		// the currentdashboard owner is set as platform analytics board owner
		var grPDUM = new GlideRecord('par_dashboard_user_metadata');
		grPDUM.initialize();
		grPDUM.setValue('created_on', new GlideDateTime());
		grPDUM.setValue('last_updated_on', new GlideDateTime());
		grPDUM.setValue('updated_by_user', gs.getUserID());
		grPDUM.setValue('dashboard', pAboard);
		grPDUM.setValue('created_by_user', currDashboard.owner);
		grPDUM.insert();
	},

	createTabs: function (currDashboard, pAboard) {
		// replicate the tabs from the current dashbaord
		var grPM2DT = new GlideRecord('pa_m2m_dashboard_tabs');
		grPM2DT.addEncodedQuery("dashboard=" + currDashboard.getUniqueValue());
		grPM2DT.query();
		while (grPM2DT.next()) {
			var grPDT = new GlideRecord('par_dashboard_tab');
			grPDT.initialize();
			grPDT.dashboard = pAboard;
			grPDT.name = grPM2DT.getDisplayValue('tab');
			grPDT.order = grPM2DT.order;
			var tab = grPDT.insert();

			// create canvas data
			this.createCanvas(tab, pAboard, grPM2DT);
		}
		this.createEmptyCanvas(pAboard); // create empty layout
	},

	createCanvas: function (tab, pAboard, currDashboardTab) {
		var grPDC = new GlideRecord('par_dashboard_canvas');
		grPDC.initialize();
		grPDC.setValue('layout', '');
		grPDC.setValue('dashboard_tab', tab);
		grPDC.setValue('dashboard', pAboard);
		var tabCanvas = grPDC.insert();
		if (tabCanvas) {
			this.checkReportsLinked(tab, tabCanvas, currDashboardTab);
		}
	},

	createEmptyCanvas: function(pAboard){
		var grPDCe = new GlideRecord('par_dashboard_canvas');
		grPDCe.initialize();
		grPDCe.setValue('layout', '[]');
		grPDCe.setValue('dashboard', pAboard);
		grPDCe.insert();
	},

	checkReportsLinked: function (tab, canvas, currDashboardTab) {
		// query all the reports in the current board and check if they are single score
		var sys_portal = new GlideRecord('sys_portal');
		sys_portal.addQuery('page', currDashboardTab.tab.page);
		sys_portal.query();
		while (sys_portal.next()) {
			var preference = new GlideRecord('sys_portal_preferences');
			preference.addQuery('portal_section', sys_portal.sys_id);
			preference.addQuery('name', 'sys_id');
			preference.query();
			while (preference.next()) {
				var report_id = preference.value.toString();
				this.checkReportTypeTriggerWidget(report_id, canvas);
			}
		}
	},

	checkReportTypeTriggerWidget: function (sysidOfReport, canvas) {
		// calls the decision table and evaluates if the report is single score and then uses the template json as output and maps the layout for platform board created
		var grSysReport = new GlideRecord('sys_report');
		if (grSysReport.get(sysidOfReport)) {
			var dt = new sn_dt.DecisionTableAPI();
			var inputs = {};
			inputs['u_type'] = grSysReport.type.toString(); // String 
			try {
				var response = dt.getDecision('6fa365c547533150abc2d264336d4386', inputs);
				var jsoncomponent = JSON.parse(response.result_elements.u_jsonobject);
				var list = [
					jsoncomponent.dataSources[0].tableOrViewName = grSysReport.table.toString(),
					jsoncomponent.dataSources[0].label = grSysReport.title.toString(),
					jsoncomponent.headerTitle = grSysReport.title.toString(),
					jsoncomponent.dataSources[0].filterQuery = grSysReport.filter.toString()
				];
				return this.createPARWidget(canvas, response.result_elements.u_json, JSON.stringify(jsoncomponent));
			} catch (err) {
				return false;
			}
		}
	},

	createPARWidget: function (canvas, component, jsoncomponent) {

		var grPDW = new GlideRecord('par_dashboard_widget');
		grPDW.initialize();
		grPDW.setValue('canvas', canvas);
		grPDW.setValue('component', component);
		grPDW.setValue('component_props', jsoncomponent);
		grPDW.setValue('w', '10');
		grPDW.setValue('h', '10');
		return grPDW.insert();
	},

	type: 'parBoardConvertUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mura</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-17 10:57:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>684e54af4787f510abc2d264336d4343</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>parBoardConvertUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_684e54af4787f510abc2d264336d4343</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mura</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-22 08:12:54</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
